System Ranking

Points Ranks
Below 1200 Novices (No)
1200 - 1400 Silver I (SI)
1400 - 1600 Silver II (SII)
1600 - 1800 Gold I (GI)
1800 - 2000 Gold II (GII)
2000 - 2200 Candidat Nova (CD)
2200 - 2300 Candidat Nova II (CDII)
2300 - 2400 Nova (N)
2400 - 2500 International Nova (IN)
2500 - 2700 Grand Nova (GN)
2700 and above Super grandnova (SGN)
